text: The word [strongs id="h1697" /] of the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] that came to Joel [strongs id="h3100" /] the son [strongs id="h1121" /] of Pethuel [strongs id="h6602" /].

Hear [strongs id="h8085" tvm="8798" /] this, ye old men [strongs id="h2205" /], and give ear [strongs id="h238" tvm="8685" /], all ye inhabitants [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8802" /] of the land [strongs id="h776" /]. Hath this been in your days [strongs id="h3117" /], or even [strongs id="h518" /] in the days [strongs id="h3117" /] of your fathers [strongs id="h1" /]?

Tell [strongs id="h5608" tvm="8761" /] ye your children [strongs id="h1121" /] of it, and [let] your children [strongs id="h1121" /] [tell] their children [strongs id="h1121" /], and their children [strongs id="h1121" /] another [strongs id="h312" /] generation [strongs id="h1755" /].

That which the palmerworm [strongs id="h1501" /] hath left [strongs id="h3499" /] hath the locust [strongs id="h697" /] eaten [strongs id="h398" tvm="8804" /]; and that which the locust [strongs id="h697" /] hath left [strongs id="h3499" /] hath the cankerworm [strongs id="h3218" /] eaten [strongs id="h398" tvm="8804" /]; and that which the cankerworm [strongs id="h3218" /] hath left [strongs id="h3499" /] hath the caterpiller [strongs id="h2625" /] eaten [strongs id="h398" tvm="8804" /].

Awake [strongs id="h6974" tvm="8685" /], ye drunkards [strongs id="h7910" /], and weep [strongs id="h1058" tvm="8798" /]; and howl [strongs id="h3213" tvm="8685" /], all ye drinkers [strongs id="h8354" tvm="8802" /] of wine [strongs id="h3196" /], because of the new wine [strongs id="h6071" /]; for it is cut off [strongs id="h3772" tvm="8738" /] from your mouth [strongs id="h6310" /].

For a nation [strongs id="h1471" /] is come up [strongs id="h5927" tvm="8804" /] upon my land [strongs id="h776" /], strong [strongs id="h6099" /], and without number [strongs id="h4557" /], whose teeth [strongs id="h8127" /] [are] the teeth [strongs id="h8127" /] of a lion [strongs id="h738" /], and he hath the cheek teeth [strongs id="h4973" /] of a great lion [strongs id="h3833" /].

He hath laid [strongs id="h7760" tvm="8804" /] my vine [strongs id="h1612" /] waste [strongs id="h8047" /], and barked [strongs id="h7111" /] my fig tree [strongs id="h8384" /]: he hath made it clean [strongs id="h2834" tvm="8800" /] bare [strongs id="h2834" tvm="8804" /], and cast [it] away [strongs id="h7993" tvm="8689" /]; the branches [strongs id="h8299" /] thereof are made white [strongs id="h3835" tvm="8689" /].

Lament [strongs id="h421" tvm="8798" /] like a virgin [strongs id="h1330" /] girded [strongs id="h2296" tvm="8803" /] with sackcloth [strongs id="h8242" /] for the husband [strongs id="h1167" /] of her youth [strongs id="h5271" /].

The meat offering [strongs id="h4503" /] and the drink offering [strongs id="h5262" /] is cut off [strongs id="h3772" tvm="8717" /] from the house [strongs id="h1004" /] of the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /]; the priests [strongs id="h3548" /], the LORDâ€™S [strongs id="h3068" /] ministers [strongs id="h8334" tvm="8764" /], mourn [strongs id="h56" tvm="8804" /].

The field [strongs id="h7704" /] is wasted [strongs id="h7703" tvm="8795" /], the land [strongs id="h127" /] mourneth [strongs id="h56" tvm="8804" /]; for the corn [strongs id="h1715" /] is wasted [strongs id="h7703" tvm="8795" /]: the new wine [strongs id="h8492" /] is dried up [strongs id="h3001" tvm="8689" /], the oil [strongs id="h3323" /] languisheth [strongs id="h535" tvm="8797" /].

Be ye ashamed [strongs id="h3001" tvm="8685" /], O ye husbandmen [strongs id="h406" /]; howl [strongs id="h3213" tvm="8685" /], O ye vinedressers [strongs id="h3755" /], for the wheat [strongs id="h2406" /] and for the barley [strongs id="h8184" /]; because the harvest [strongs id="h7105" /] of the field [strongs id="h7704" /] is perished [strongs id="h6" tvm="8804" /].

The vine [strongs id="h1612" /] is dried up [strongs id="h3001" tvm="8689" /], and the fig tree [strongs id="h8384" /] languisheth [strongs id="h535" tvm="8797" /]; the pomegranate [strongs id="h7416" /] tree, the palm tree [strongs id="h8558" /] also, and the apple tree [strongs id="h8598" /], [even] all the trees [strongs id="h6086" /] of the field [strongs id="h7704" /], are withered [strongs id="h3001" tvm="8804" /]: because joy [strongs id="h8342" /] is withered away [strongs id="h3001" tvm="8689" /] from the sons [strongs id="h1121" /] of men [strongs id="h120" /].

Gird [strongs id="h2296" tvm="8798" /] yourselves, and lament [strongs id="h5594" tvm="8798" /], ye priests [strongs id="h3548" /]: howl [strongs id="h3213" tvm="8685" /], ye ministers [strongs id="h8334" tvm="8764" /] of the altar [strongs id="h4196" /]: come [strongs id="h935" tvm="8798" /], lie all night [strongs id="h3885" tvm="8798" /] in sackcloth [strongs id="h8242" /], ye ministers [strongs id="h8334" tvm="8764" /] of my God [strongs id="h430" /]: for the meat offering [strongs id="h4503" /] and the drink offering [strongs id="h5262" /] is withholden [strongs id="h4513" tvm="8738" /] from the house [strongs id="h1004" /] of your God [strongs id="h430" /].

Sanctify [strongs id="h6942" tvm="8761" /] ye a fast [strongs id="h6685" /], call [strongs id="h7121" tvm="8798" /] a solemn assembly [strongs id="h6116" /], gather [strongs id="h622" tvm="8798" /] the elders [strongs id="h2205" /] [and] all the inhabitants [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8802" /] of the land [strongs id="h776" /] [into] the house [strongs id="h1004" /] of the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] your God [strongs id="h430" /], and cry [strongs id="h2199" tvm="8798" /] unto the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /],

Alas [strongs id="h162" /] for the day [strongs id="h3117" /]! for the day [strongs id="h3117" /] of the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] [is] at hand [strongs id="h7138" /], and as a destruction [strongs id="h7701" /] from the Almighty [strongs id="h7706" /] shall it come [strongs id="h935" tvm="8799" /].

Is not the meat [strongs id="h400" /] cut off [strongs id="h3772" tvm="8738" /] before our eyes [strongs id="h5869" /], [yea], joy [strongs id="h8057" /] and gladness [strongs id="h1524" /] from the house [strongs id="h1004" /] of our God [strongs id="h430" /]?

The seed [strongs id="h6507" /] is rotten [strongs id="h5685" tvm="8804" /] under their clods [strongs id="h4053" /], the garners [strongs id="h214" /] are laid desolate [strongs id="h8074" tvm="8738" /], the barns [strongs id="h4460" /] are broken down [strongs id="h2040" tvm="8738" /]; for the corn [strongs id="h1715" /] is withered [strongs id="h3001" tvm="8689" /].

How do the beasts [strongs id="h929" /] groan [strongs id="h584" tvm="8737" /]! the herds [strongs id="h5739" /] of cattle [strongs id="h1241" /] are perplexed [strongs id="h943" tvm="8738" /], because they have no pasture [strongs id="h4829" /]; yea, the flocks [strongs id="h5739" /] of sheep [strongs id="h6629" /] are made desolate [strongs id="h816" tvm="8738" /].

O LORD [strongs id="h3068" /], to thee will I cry [strongs id="h7121" tvm="8799" /]: for the fire [strongs id="h784" /] hath devoured [strongs id="h398" tvm="8804" /] the pastures [strongs id="h4999" /] of the wilderness [strongs id="h4057" /], and the flame [strongs id="h3852" /] hath burned [strongs id="h3857" tvm="8765" /] all the trees [strongs id="h6086" /] of the field [strongs id="h7704" /].

The beasts [strongs id="h929" /] of the field [strongs id="h7704" /] cry [strongs id="h6165" tvm="8799" /] also unto thee: for the rivers [strongs id="h650" /] of waters [strongs id="h4325" /] are dried up [strongs id="h3001" tvm="8804" /], and the fire [strongs id="h784" /] hath devoured [strongs id="h398" tvm="8804" /] the pastures [strongs id="h4999" /] of the wilderness [strongs id="h4057" /].

Blow [strongs id="h8628" tvm="8798" /] ye the trumpet [strongs id="h7782" /] in Zion [strongs id="h6726" /], and sound an alarm [strongs id="h7321" tvm="8685" /] in my holy [strongs id="h6944" /] mountain [strongs id="h2022" /]: let all the inhabitants [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8802" /] of the land [strongs id="h776" /] tremble [strongs id="h7264" tvm="8799" /]: for the day [strongs id="h3117" /] of the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] cometh [strongs id="h935" tvm="8804" /], for [it is] nigh at hand [strongs id="h7138" /];

A day [strongs id="h3117" /] of darkness [strongs id="h2822" /] and of gloominess [strongs id="h653" /], a day [strongs id="h3117" /] of clouds [strongs id="h6051" /] and of thick darkness [strongs id="h6205" /], as the morning [strongs id="h7837" /] spread [strongs id="h6566" tvm="8803" /] upon the mountains [strongs id="h2022" /]: a great [strongs id="h7227" /] people [strongs id="h5971" /] and a strong [strongs id="h6099" /]; there hath not been [strongs id="h1961" tvm="8738" /] ever [strongs id="h5769" /] the like, neither shall be any more [strongs id="h3254" tvm="8686" /] after [strongs id="h310" /] it, [even] to the years [strongs id="h8141" /] of many [strongs id="h1755" /] generations [strongs id="h1755" /].

A fire [strongs id="h784" /] devoureth [strongs id="h398" tvm="8804" /] before [strongs id="h6440" /] them; and behind [strongs id="h310" /] them a flame [strongs id="h3852" /] burneth [strongs id="h3857" tvm="8762" /]: the land [strongs id="h776" /] [is] as the garden [strongs id="h1588" /] of Eden [strongs id="h5731" /] before [strongs id="h6440" /] them, and behind [strongs id="h310" /] them a desolate [strongs id="h8077" /] wilderness [strongs id="h4057" /]; yea, and nothing shall escape [strongs id="h6413" /] them.

The appearance [strongs id="h4758" /] of them [is] as the appearance [strongs id="h4758" /] of horses [strongs id="h5483" /]; and as horsemen [strongs id="h6571" /], so shall they run [strongs id="h7323" tvm="8799" /].

Like the noise [strongs id="h6963" /] of chariots [strongs id="h4818" /] on the tops [strongs id="h7218" /] of mountains [strongs id="h2022" /] shall they leap [strongs id="h7540" tvm="8762" /], like the noise [strongs id="h6963" /] of a flame [strongs id="h3851" /] of fire [strongs id="h784" /] that devoureth [strongs id="h398" tvm="8802" /] the stubble [strongs id="h7179" /], as a strong [strongs id="h6099" /] people [strongs id="h5971" /] set in battle [strongs id="h4421" /] array [strongs id="h6186" tvm="8803" /].

Before their face [strongs id="h6440" /] the people [strongs id="h5971" /] shall be much pained [strongs id="h2342" tvm="8799" /]: all faces [strongs id="h6440" /] shall gather [strongs id="h6908" tvm="8765" /] blackness [strongs id="h6289" /].

They shall run [strongs id="h7323" tvm="8799" /] like mighty men [strongs id="h1368" /]; they shall climb [strongs id="h5927" tvm="8799" /] the wall [strongs id="h2346" /] like men [strongs id="h582" /] of war [strongs id="h4421" /]; and they shall march [strongs id="h3212" tvm="8799" /] every one [strongs id="h376" /] on his ways [strongs id="h1870" /], and they shall not break [strongs id="h5670" tvm="8762" /] their ranks [strongs id="h734" /]:

Neither shall one [strongs id="h376" /] thrust [strongs id="h1766" tvm="8799" /] another [strongs id="h251" /]; they shall walk [strongs id="h3212" tvm="8799" /] every one [strongs id="h1397" /] in his path [strongs id="h4546" /]: and [when] they fall [strongs id="h5307" tvm="8799" /] upon the sword [strongs id="h7973" /], they shall not be wounded [strongs id="h1214" tvm="8799" /].

They shall run to and fro [strongs id="h8264" tvm="8799" /] in the city [strongs id="h5892" /]; they shall run [strongs id="h7323" tvm="8799" /] upon the wall [strongs id="h2346" /], they shall climb up [strongs id="h5927" tvm="8799" /] upon the houses [strongs id="h1004" /]; they shall enter in [strongs id="h935" tvm="8799" /] at the windows [strongs id="h2474" /] like a thief [strongs id="h1590" /].

The earth [strongs id="h776" /] shall quake [strongs id="h7264" tvm="8804" /] before [strongs id="h6440" /] them; the heavens [strongs id="h8064" /] shall tremble [strongs id="h7493" tvm="8804" /]: the sun [strongs id="h8121" /] and the moon [strongs id="h3394" /] shall be dark [strongs id="h6937" tvm="8804" /], and the stars [strongs id="h3556" /] shall withdraw [strongs id="h622" tvm="8804" /] their shining [strongs id="h5051" /]:

And the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] shall utter [strongs id="h5414" tvm="8804" /] his voice [strongs id="h6963" /] before [strongs id="h6440" /] his army [strongs id="h2428" /]: for his camp [strongs id="h4264" /] [is] very [strongs id="h3966" /] great [strongs id="h7227" /]: for [he is] strong [strongs id="h6099" /] that executeth [strongs id="h6213" tvm="8802" /] his word [strongs id="h1697" /]: for the day [strongs id="h3117" /] of the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] [is] great [strongs id="h1419" /] and very [strongs id="h3966" /] terrible [strongs id="h3372" tvm="8737" /]; and who can abide [strongs id="h3557" tvm="8686" /] it?

Therefore also now, saith [strongs id="h5002" tvm="8803" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /], turn [strongs id="h7725" tvm="8798" /] ye [even] to me with all your heart [strongs id="h3824" /], and with fasting [strongs id="h6685" /], and with weeping [strongs id="h1065" /], and with mourning [strongs id="h4553" /]:

And rend [strongs id="h7167" tvm="8798" /] your heart [strongs id="h3824" /], and not your garments [strongs id="h899" /], and turn [strongs id="h7725" tvm="8798" /] unto the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] your God [strongs id="h430" /]: for he [is] gracious [strongs id="h2587" /] and merciful [strongs id="h7349" /], slow [strongs id="h750" /] to anger [strongs id="h639" /], and of great [strongs id="h7227" /] kindness [strongs id="h2617" /], and repenteth [strongs id="h5162" tvm="8737" /] him of the evil [strongs id="h7451" /].

Who knoweth [strongs id="h3045" tvm="8802" /] [if] he will return [strongs id="h7725" tvm="8799" /] and repent [strongs id="h5162" tvm="8738" /], and leave [strongs id="h7604" tvm="8689" /] a blessing [strongs id="h1293" /] behind [strongs id="h310" /] him; [even] a meat offering [strongs id="h4503" /] and a drink offering [strongs id="h5262" /] unto the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] your God [strongs id="h430" /]?

Blow [strongs id="h8628" tvm="8798" /] the trumpet [strongs id="h7782" /] in Zion [strongs id="h6726" /], sanctify [strongs id="h6942" tvm="8761" /] a fast [strongs id="h6685" /], call [strongs id="h7121" tvm="8798" /] a solemn assembly [strongs id="h6116" /]:

Gather [strongs id="h622" tvm="8798" /] the people [strongs id="h5971" /], sanctify [strongs id="h6942" tvm="8761" /] the congregation [strongs id="h6951" /], assemble [strongs id="h6908" tvm="8798" /] the elders [strongs id="h2205" /], gather [strongs id="h622" tvm="8798" /] the children [strongs id="h5768" /], and those that suck [strongs id="h3243" tvm="8802" /] the breasts [strongs id="h7699" /]: let the bridegroom [strongs id="h2860" /] go forth [strongs id="h3318" tvm="8799" /] of his chamber [strongs id="h2315" /], and the bride [strongs id="h3618" /] out of her closet [strongs id="h2646" /].

Let the priests [strongs id="h3548" /], the ministers [strongs id="h8334" tvm="8764" /] of the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /], weep [strongs id="h1058" tvm="8799" /] between the porch [strongs id="h197" /] and the altar [strongs id="h4196" /], and let them say [strongs id="h559" tvm="8799" /], Spare [strongs id="h2347" tvm="8798" /] thy people [strongs id="h5971" /], O LORD [strongs id="h3068" /], and give [strongs id="h5414" tvm="8799" /] not thine heritage [strongs id="h5159" /] to reproach [strongs id="h2781" /], that the heathen [strongs id="h1471" /] should rule over [strongs id="h4910" tvm="8800" /] them: wherefore should they say [strongs id="h559" tvm="8799" /] among the people [strongs id="h5971" /], Where [is] their God [strongs id="h430" /]?

Then will the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] be jealous [strongs id="h7065" tvm="8762" /] for his land [strongs id="h776" /], and pity [strongs id="h2550" tvm="8799" /] his people [strongs id="h5971" /].

Yea, the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] will answer [strongs id="h6030" tvm="8799" /] and say [strongs id="h559" tvm="8799" /] unto his people [strongs id="h5971" /], Behold, I will send [strongs id="h7971" tvm="8802" /] you corn [strongs id="h1715" /], and wine [strongs id="h8492" /], and oil [strongs id="h3323" /], and ye shall be satisfied [strongs id="h7646" tvm="8804" /] therewith: and I will no more make [strongs id="h5414" tvm="8799" /] you a reproach [strongs id="h2781" /] among the heathen [strongs id="h1471" /]:

But I will remove far off [strongs id="h7368" tvm="8686" /] from you the northern [strongs id="h6830" /] [army], and will drive [strongs id="h5080" tvm="8689" /] him into a land [strongs id="h776" /] barren [strongs id="h6723" /] and desolate [strongs id="h8077" /], with his face [strongs id="h6440" /] toward the east [strongs id="h6931" /] sea [strongs id="h3220" /], and his hinder part [strongs id="h5490" /] toward the utmost [strongs id="h314" /] sea [strongs id="h3220" /], and his stink [strongs id="h889" /] shall come up [strongs id="h5927" tvm="8804" /], and his ill savour [strongs id="h6709" /] shall come up [strongs id="h5927" tvm="8799" /], because he hath done [strongs id="h6213" tvm="8800" /] great things [strongs id="h1431" tvm="8689" /].

Fear [strongs id="h3372" tvm="8799" /] not, O land [strongs id="h127" /]; be glad [strongs id="h1523" tvm="8798" /] and rejoice [strongs id="h8055" tvm="8798" /]: for the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] will do [strongs id="h6213" tvm="8800" /] great things [strongs id="h1431" tvm="8689" /].

Be not afraid [strongs id="h3372" tvm="8799" /], ye beasts [strongs id="h929" /] of the field [strongs id="h7704" /]: for the pastures [strongs id="h4999" /] of the wilderness [strongs id="h4057" /] do spring [strongs id="h1876" tvm="8804" /], for the tree [strongs id="h6086" /] beareth [strongs id="h5375" tvm="8804" /] her fruit [strongs id="h6529" /], the fig tree [strongs id="h8384" /] and the vine [strongs id="h1612" /] do yield [strongs id="h5414" tvm="8804" /] their strength [strongs id="h2428" /].

Be glad [strongs id="h1523" tvm="8798" /] then, ye children [strongs id="h1121" /] of Zion [strongs id="h6726" /], and rejoice [strongs id="h8055" tvm="8798" /] in the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] your God [strongs id="h430" /]: for he hath given [strongs id="h5414" tvm="8804" /] you the former rain [strongs id="h4175" /] moderately [strongs id="h6666" /], and he will cause to come down [strongs id="h3381" tvm="8686" /] for you the rain [strongs id="h1653" /], the former rain [strongs id="h4175" /], and the latter rain [strongs id="h4456" /] in the first [strongs id="h7223" /] [month].

And the floors [strongs id="h1637" /] shall be full [strongs id="h4390" tvm="8804" /] of wheat [strongs id="h1250" /], and the fats [strongs id="h3342" /] shall overflow [strongs id="h7783" tvm="8689" /] with wine [strongs id="h8492" /] and oil [strongs id="h3323" /].

And I will restore [strongs id="h7999" tvm="8765" /] to you the years [strongs id="h8141" /] that the locust [strongs id="h697" /] hath eaten [strongs id="h398" tvm="8804" /], the cankerworm [strongs id="h3218" /], and the caterpiller [strongs id="h2625" /], and the palmerworm [strongs id="h1501" /], my great [strongs id="h1419" /] army [strongs id="h2428" /] which I sent [strongs id="h7971" tvm="8765" /] among you.
